description:
This content requires "Shadowverse: Champion's Battle" and cannot be used with the demo version.

Allows you to change your Shadowcraft leader to Shadow Knight: Ein for use in online matches.

Notice
-This additional content is also obtainable as a reward through a Premium Pass, which can be purchased in-game. Make sure to confirm that you have not already obtained the item before purchasing.
-This leader skin is only for use by the Shadowcraft class.
-Leader skins can only be used for online matches. (Cannot be used in story battles.)
-Nintendo Switch Online membership is required to play online matches.
-Updating to the latest version of the game is required to use this content.
name: Leader Skin: "Shadow Knight: Ein"
